meanings.definition: The activity of purchasing goods from stores.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy going for shoppings with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She always does her shoppings at the mall closest to her house.
meanings.sent3: After a long day of shoppings, we treated ourselves to ice cream.
meanings.sent4: Her shoppings were like a treasure hunt, finding the best deals.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of shoppings filled the air as we entered the store.

meanings.definition: The goods that are purchased from stores.
meanings.sent1: The shoppings she made yesterday included clothes and shoes.
meanings.sent2: He carried all his shoppings in bags as he walked home.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over her shoppings, scattering items everywhere.
meanings.sent4: His shoppings filled the pantry, leaving no space for more groceries.
meanings.sent5: The quality of her shoppings was evident in the durability of the items.
